name: buildautomata-memory
description: Persistent episodic memory system for Claude with temporal versioning, semantic search, and graph navigation. Enables continuous learning across conversations.

tools.name: store_memory
tools.description: Store a new memory with flexible categorization

tools.name: search_memories
tools.description: Search memories via semantic + full-text search

tools.name: get_memory
tools.description: Retrieve specific memory by ID with full details

tools.name: store_intention
tools.description: Store proactive intention for agent to pursue

tools.name: get_active_intentions
tools.description: Get all active intentions ordered by priority

tools.name: initialize_agent
tools.description: Proactive initialization - checks continuity and intentions

tools.name: traverse_memory_graph
tools.description: Traverse memory graph from a starting memory ID

tools.name: find_memory_clusters
tools.description: Find clusters of connected memories in the graph

tools.name: get_command_history
tools.description: Get history of MCP tool calls for audit trail

username.title: Username
username.description: Your username for organizing memories (defaults to OS username if not specified)

max_memories.title: Maximum Memories
max_memories.description: Maximum number of memories to retain before pruning old ones

cache_maxsize.title: Cache Size
cache_maxsize.description: Maximum number of memories to keep in RAM cache
